description: The UpgradeStatusSummary resource allows the creation and management of Avi UpgradeStatusSummary

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

EnablePatchRollback.description: Check if the patch rollback is possible on this node. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

EnableRollback.description: Check if the rollback is possible on this node. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

EndTime.description: End time of upgrade operations. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

ImageRef.description: Image uuid for identifying the current base image. It is a reference to an object of type image. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

Name.description: Name of the system such as cluster name, se group name and se name. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

NodeType.description: Type of the system such as controller_cluster, se_group or se. Enum options - NODE_CONTROLLER_CLUSTER, NODE_SE_GROUP, NODE_SE_TYPE. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

ObjCloudRef.description: Cloud that this object belongs to. It is a reference to an object of type cloud. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

PatchImageRef.description: Image uuid for identifying the current patch. It is a reference to an object of type image. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

StartTime.description: Start time of upgrade operations. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

TasksCompleted.description: Upgrade tasks completed. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

TenantRef.description: Tenant that this object belongs to. It is a reference to an object of type tenant. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

TotalTasks.description: Total upgrade tasks. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

UpgradeOps.description: Upgrade operations requested. Enum options - UPGRADE, PATCH, ROLLBACK, ROLLBACKPATCH, SEGROUP_RESUME. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

Version.description: Current base image applied to this node. Field introduced in 18.2.6.
